Key Match Events: Bobby Miller gave up seven runs, including five in the first inning.
Mickey Moniak hit a first-pitch, three-run homer.
Niko Kavadas hit a home run in the second inning.
Taylor Ward hit a home run in the fifth inning.
Post-Match Reflections: Bobby Miller expressed his disappointment, stating, 'I’m obviously not happy about it.'
Manager Dave Roberts commented on Miller's performance, saying, 'You just can’t go out there and give up five runs and put us behind the 8-ball.'

Roberts also mentioned, 'Performance matters. It’s not about the stuff, because as we’ve seen the stuff is there. I say it time and time again, it’s about performance. You’ve got to perform and give us a chance.'
